Literature.Title: Designed Host Defense Peptides for the Treatment of Bacterial Keratitis.
Literature.Author: Clemens LE, Jaynes J, Lim E, Kolar SS, Reins RY, Baidouri H, Hanlon SM, McDermott AM, Woodburn KW

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=>64µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 51625(MIC=>64µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=>64µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 13048(MIC=>64µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978D-5(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 19660(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>64µg/ml)
